com.davidmiguel.gobees.data.source

Interface GoBeesDataSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GoBeesLocalDataSource, GoBeesRepository

    public interface GoBeesDataSource
    Main entry point for accessing apiaries data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getApiaryBlocking

        Gets apiary with given id. Blocking function.
        Parameters:
        apiaryId - apiary id.
        Returns:
        requested apiary.

      • saveApiary

        void saveApiary(@NonNull
                Apiary apiary,
                @NonNull
                GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Saves given apiary. If it already exists, is updated. Note: apiary must be a new unmanaged object (don't modify managed objects).
        Parameters:
        apiary - apiary unmanaged object.
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • refreshApiaries

        void refreshApiaries()
        Force to update cache.

      • deleteApiary

                  @NonNull
                  GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Delete apiary.
        Parameters:
        apiaryId - apiary id.
        callback - TaskCallback.

                       GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)

        Parameters:
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • getNextApiaryId

        void getNextApiaryId(@NonNull
                     GoBeesDataSource.GetNextApiaryIdCallback callback)
        Returns the next apiary id. (Realm does not support auto-increment at the moment).
        Parameters:
        callback - GetNextApiaryIdCallback.

      • getApiaryLastRevision

        java.util.Date getApiaryLastRevision(long apiaryId)
        Gets the last date when apiary info was updated.
        Parameters:
        apiaryId - apiary id.
        Returns:
        apiary last revision date.

      • getHives

        void getHives(long apiaryId,
              @NonNull
              GoBeesDataSource.GetHivesCallback callback)
        Gets all hives. Note: don't modify the Hive objects.
        Parameters:
        apiaryId - apiary id.
        callback - GetHivesCallback.

      • getHive

             @NonNull
             GoBeesDataSource.GetHiveCallback callback)

        hiveId - hive id.
        callback - GetHiveCallback

      • getHiveWithRecordings

        void getHiveWithRecordings(long hiveId,
                           @NonNull
                           GoBeesDataSource.GetHiveCallback callback)
        Returns a hive with all its recordings (but no meteo data).
        Parameters:
        hiveId - hive id.
        callback - GetHiveCallback.

      • refreshHives

        void refreshHives(long apiaryId)
        Force to update hives cache.

      • saveHive

        void saveHive(long apiaryId,
              @NonNull
              Hive hive,
              @NonNull
              GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Saves given hive. If it already exists, is updated. Note: hive must be a new unmanaged object (don't modify managed objects).
        Parameters:
        apiaryId - apiary id.
        hive - hive unmanaged object.
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • deleteHive

                @NonNull
                GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Deletes given hive.
        Parameters:
        hiveId - hive id.
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • getNextHiveId

        void getNextHiveId(@NonNull
                   GoBeesDataSource.GetNextHiveIdCallback callback)
        Returns the next hive id. (Realm does not support auto-increment at the moment).
        Parameters:
        callback - GetNextHiveIdCallback.

      • saveRecord

        void saveRecord(long hiveId,
                @NonNull
                Record record,
                @NonNull
                GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Saves given record. If it already exists, is updated. Note: record must be a new unmanaged object (don't modify managed objects). Actual id record will be used.
        Parameters:
        hiveId - hive id.
        record - record unmanaged object.
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • saveRecords

        void saveRecords(long hiveId,
                 @NonNull
                 java.util.List<Record> records,
                 @NonNull
                 GoBeesDataSource.SaveRecordingCallback callback)
        Saves given list of records. Note: record must be a new unmanaged object (don't modify managed objects). The record id will be assigned (actual id will be ignored).
        Parameters:
        records - list of record unmanaged objects.
        callback - SaveRecordingCallback.

      • getRecording

        void getRecording(long apiaryId,
                  long hiveId,
                  java.util.Date start,
                  java.util.Date end,
                  @NonNull
                  GoBeesDataSource.GetRecordingCallback callback)
        Gets recording with records and weather data of given period.
        Parameters:
        apiaryId - apiary id.
        hiveId - hive id.
        start - start of the period (00:00 of that date).
        end - end of the period (23:59 of that date).
        callback - GetRecordingCallback.

      • deleteRecording

        void deleteRecording(long hiveId,
                     @NonNull
                     Recording recording,
                     @NonNull
                     GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Deletes the records contained in the given recording.
        Parameters:
        hiveId - hive id.
        recording - recording to delete.
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • updateApiariesCurrentWeather

        void updateApiariesCurrentWeather(java.util.List<Apiary> apiariesToUpdate,
                                  @NonNull
                                  GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Updates the current weather of the apiaries in the list.
        Parameters:
        apiariesToUpdate - apiaries to update weather.
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • getAndSaveMeteoRecord

                           @NonNull
                           GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback callback)
        Gets and saves a meteo record from an apiary.
        Parameters:
        apiary - corresponding apiary.
        callback - TaskCallback.

      • saveMeteoRecords

        void saveMeteoRecords(long apiaryId,
                      @NonNull
                      java.util.List<MeteoRecord> meteoRecords)
        Save a list of meteo records from an apiary.
        Parameters:
        apiaryId - apiary id.
        meteoRecords - list of meteo records.

      • refreshRecordings

        void refreshRecordings(long hiveId)
        Force to update recordings cache.
